name: Poor Deal
description:
Your goal is to produce and sell mysterious drinks, sounds easy but here is the gatch. The electricity prices are rising, and it makes it more difficult to produce the products efficiently. You have to manage how much electricity you are willing to use every day, and you need to pay the bills in time. Buy new machines and upgrade your gear to become an even better drink producer. 

Controls:

- Press the red button to turn off the machine

- Press the red switch to turn off the light

- Click on the produce button to manually produce the drink

- Press on the full bottle to sell it
